# invalidConfigurationError

**Type Property**

An error that occurs when they system attempts to add a Secure Element pass using an invalid configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
static var invalidConfigurationError: PKAddSecureElementPassError.Code { get }
```

## Discussion

Before you attempt to add a Secure Element pass, validate its configuration using the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddSecureElementPassViewController/canAddSecureElementPass(configuration:)] method.

## Identifying errors

- **deviceNotReadyError**: The device isn’t ready to add Secure Element passes.
- **deviceNotSupportedError**: The device doesn’t support adding Secure Element passes.
- **unavailableError**: PassKit is temporarily unable to add Secure Element passes.
- **unknownError**: An error that occurs when PassKit cancels the addition of a Secure Element pass due to an unknown failure.
- **userCanceledError**: An error that occurs when the user cancels the addition of a Secure Element pass.
- **PKAddSecureElementPassError.Code**: Error codes for problems that occur when you add a secure element passes.
